rs.fon.whibo.GC.component.RecalculateRepresentatives

Class ArithmeticMean

  • java.lang.Object
    • rs.fon.whibo.problem.AbstractComponent
      • rs.fon.whibo.GC.component.RecalculateRepresentatives.AbstractRecalculateRepresentatives
        • rs.fon.whibo.GC.component.RecalculateRepresentatives.ArithmeticMean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecalculateRepresentatives

    public class ArithmeticMean
extends AbstractRecalculateRepresentatives
    The Class ArithmeticMean recalculates representatives as an arithmetic mean of all data points assigned to current cluster. J. Hartigan and M. Wong, Algorithm AS136: A k-means clustering algorithm, Applied Statistics 28 (1979), pp. 100–108

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArithmeticMean(java.util.List<SubproblemParameter> parameters)
      Instantiates an arithmetic mean component for recalculating cluster representatives.
